In a message dated 11/19/01 8:25:57 PM Pacific Standard Time, 
Rudra656@... writes:

Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons:


"Yeah, you'll die, you slag hole!" Nemesis yelled, basically ignoring 
everything else Chaostaur said as two autoguns descended from the ceiling, 
six feet apart from each other, firing rounds of ammo down at Chaostaur.

Dark One roughly pushed Nemesis back, firing off two bolts from his plasma 
rifle at Chaostaur's torso.

Mortar fired off two more grenades at Chaostaur, one towards his feet and the 
other at his chest.  

Pyro was hit with the two shots, slamming into the wall, but he was okay, 
firing off a burst of flames at Chaostaur from his flame cannon.  "Is that 
the best you've got?"

Hiss sidestepped the shots which passed by and struck the wall not causing 
them much damage.  He returned fire with a large blast from his fusion cannon 
at Chaostaur's left shoulder.  

Scavenger raised his chaingun, smiling, firing off twenty-five rounds of 
explosive ammunition at Chaostaur's form.

The general movement of the Oblitercons was moving backwards, more autoguns 
coming online to target the traitor.

<<    He shakes his head.  "You just can't find a decent target these days." 
  He curled up and took the shots to his heavily armored back.  "If he 
doesn't 
 want me to shoot him he should have just pointed me at something else.  Was 
 that so much to ask?"  The two explosions knock him forward a few steps and 
 he stands up again.  The fusion blast knocks him forward into a bulkhead.  
He 
 turns around and snarls.  "Do you see the missiles attached to my shoulders? 
 
 Do you know how much damage those could cause in a contained area like 
this?" 
  He fires four shots out of his heavy blasters.  Two are aimed at Pyro and 
 two at Hiss. >>
